attributes.action: Make Parliament vote to unite all parties to deal with BREXIT matters
attributes.background:
The unknown impacts of BREXIT may have the greatest effect on the UK since the great wars. 
Why are individual party goals being put before the country’s goals?
Article 50 & our BREXIT deal need to be collaborated on by all parties without political gain. 
They must work together for a solution.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
